HBN(

Calculate the HBN for a location

## Methods

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [calculate](#pydra_core.HBN.calculate) | Execute a calculation |
| [calculate_location](#pydra_core.HBN.calculate_location) | Calculate the exceedance probability of the variable at a given set of levels. |
| [set_critical_overtopping](#pydra_core.HBN.set_critical_overtopping) | Change the critical overtopping |
| [set_levels](#pydra_core.HBN.set_levels) | Change the levels. |
| [set_step_size](#pydra_core.HBN.set_step_size) | Change the step size of the frequency line. |
| [use_model_uncertainty](#pydra_core.HBN.use_model_uncertainty) | Use model uncertainty when calculating a frequency line. |

### calculate { #pydra_core.HBN.calculate }

```python
HBN.calculate(input)
```

Execute a calculation

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type                          | Description   | Default    |
|--------|-------------------------------|---------------|------------|
| input  | Union\[Location, HRDatabase\] | The input     | _required_ |

### calculate_location { #pydra_core.HBN.calculate_location }

```python
HBN.calculate_location(location)
```

Calculate the exceedance probability of the variable at a given set of levels.
If the levels are not specified, they will be chosen at the 1st and 99th percentile of all values in the database.

#### Parameter {.doc-section .doc-section-parameter}

location : Location
    The Location object

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type          | Description                       |
|--------|---------------|-----------------------------------|
|        | FrequencyLine | Frequency line of the crest level |

### set_critical_overtopping { #pydra_core.HBN.set_critical_overtopping }

```python
HBN.set_critical_overtopping(q_overtopping)
```

Change the critical overtopping

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name          | Type   | Description                       | Default    |
|---------------|--------|-----------------------------------|------------|
| q_overtopping | float  | The critical overtopping [m3/m/s] | _required_ |

### set_levels { #pydra_core.HBN.set_levels }

```python
HBN.set_levels(levels=None)
```

Change the levels.
If levels is not defined, the frequency line is calculated based upon the 1st and 99th percentile.

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type   | Description                                                         | Default   |
|--------|--------|---------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------|
| levels | list   | The levels at which the exceedance probability has to be calculated | `None`    |

### set_step_size { #pydra_core.HBN.set_step_size }

```python
HBN.set_step_size(step_size)
```

Change the step size of the frequency line.

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name      | Type   | Description                         | Default    |
|-----------|--------|-------------------------------------|------------|
| step_size | float  | The step size of the frequency line | _required_ |

### use_model_uncertainty { #pydra_core.HBN.use_model_uncertainty }

```python
HBN.use_model_uncertainty(model_uncertainty)
```

Use model uncertainty when calculating a frequency line.

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name              | Type   | Description                                      | Default    |
|-------------------|--------|--------------------------------------------------|------------|
| model_uncertainty | bool   | Enable or disable the use of model uncertainties | _required_ |
